name: Ascent (itch) (fdf4)
description:
WASD

- W pans up

- ASD for movement

Arrow Keys

- Place up to six blocks in any direction around you.

Darker colored areas are zones you can't build in,  and spikes apply knockback.

Timing and spacing are key, and some jumps require creative solutions to make it.

There are many solutions to any given section, so be creative! You might even go faster on some routes.

Make it to the top watching out for obstacles as you do!
